Pisit Charnsnoh, onye si Trang Province, Thailand, so guzobe Yadfon Association na 1985

E nyere ya Goldman Environmental Prize n'afọ 2002, maka mbọ ọ na-agba n'ichebe gburugburu ebe obibi dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke Thailand. Charnsnoh nọ na bọọdụ nke International Mangrove Action Project nke dabeere na Seattle, ma jikọtara ya na Industrial Shrimp Action Network.
